abstract: Bank of America has created an account on Twitter, the popular microblogging site, to interact with customers.
snippet: Bank of America has created an account on Twitter, the popular microblogging site, to interact with customers.
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Fallon, Shaquille O’Neal and Erykah Badu have all jumped on the Twitter bandwagon. Add to that list… Bank of America?

headline.main: Problems With Your Checking Account? Try Twitter
